Title:
The Jamaican endemic Exostema orbiculatum belongs to
Erithalis (Rubiaceae)
Abstract:
Exostema orbiculatum is transferred to the genus Erithalis
based on morphology and ITS sequences, resulting in the new combination
Erithalis orbiculata. This species, endemic to west-central Jamaica, is
unique in Erithalis for its sessile, orbicular leaves, acuminately
spinescent stipules, and sessile inflorescence and flowers.
